movie.title: Drug War
movie.description_intro: After losing control of his car and crashing into a local restaurant, a man loses consciousness on the street. Later, while working on a case, the police's anti-drug division captain, Zhang Lei (Honglei Sun), realizes that the man in the crash is drug lord Tian Ming (Louis Koo). In order to avoid the death penalty, Tian Ming helps the police put a stop to the entire drug trafficking circuit, but just as soon as the police are ready to make a large bust, Tian Ming makes a decision that shocks everyone involved.
movie.description_full: After losing control of his car and crashing into a local restaurant, a man loses consciousness on the street. Later, while working on a case, the police's anti-drug division captain, Zhang Lei (Honglei Sun), realizes that the man in the crash is drug lord Tian Ming (Louis Koo). In order to avoid the death penalty, Tian Ming helps the police put a stop to the entire drug trafficking circuit, but just as soon as the police are ready to make a large bust, Tian Ming makes a decision that shocks everyone involved.

movies.title: Twins
movies.summary: Julius and Vincent Benedict are the results of an experiment that would allow for the perfect child. Julius was planned and grows to athletic proportions. Vincent is an accident and is somewhat smaller in stature. Vincent is placed in an orphanage while Julius is taken to a South Seas island and raised by philosophers. Vincent becomes the ultimate lowlife and is about to be killed by loan sharks when Julius discovers that he has a brother and begins looking for him.

movies.title: Old Joy
movies.summary: Two old pals reunite for a camping trip in Oregon's Cascade Mountains.
movies.description_full: Two old pals reunite for a camping trip in Oregon's Cascade Mountains.
movies.synopsis: Two old pals reunite for a camping trip in Oregon's Cascade Mountains.

movies.title: Anthropocene
movies.summary: The world has ended due to wars, lack of food and resources. People have turned on each other in an effort to hoard whatever food is left. Some have turned to cannibalism. On top of that, a new, unknown virus is ravaging the planet. Clean, drinkable water has run out. Violence is running rampant through this new wasteland. Claire, a lone girl treks the new, dangerous wasteland in search of food and clean water. Clinging on to the last of her supplies, she has to fight hordes of killers after her at every turn.

movies.title: Oliver, Stoned.
movies.summary: The world's biggest stoner, Oliver, loses a high profile car, forcing him to steal an ice cream truck and enlist his wacky friends to help track down the thief before it's too late.
